background: There are two metal extraction processes, J and P, each with different requirements and pollution outputs.

parameters.definition: Units of metal extracted using process J
Units of water used by process J
Units of pollution produced by process J
Units of metal extracted using process P
Units of water used by process P
Units of pollution produced by process P

constraints.description: The number of operations involving process J must be non-negative.
constraints.code:
# Non-negativity constraint for the number of operations involving process J
model.addConstr(NumProcessJ >= 0, name="non_negative_NumProcessJ")

constraints.description: The number of operations involving the metal extraction process P must be non-negative.
constraints.code:
# Add constraint to ensure the number of operations involving process P is non-negative
model.addConstr(NumProcessP >= 0, name="non_negative_NumProcessP")

constraints.description: The total water used in both processes J and P should not exceed the maximum allowable water, MaxWater.
constraints.code:
# Add constraint for total water usage
model.addConstr((WaterJ * NumProcessJ) + (WaterP * NumProcessP) <= MaxWater, name="water_usage")

constraints.description: The total pollution generated by processes J and P cannot exceed the maximum allowable pollution.
constraints.code:
# Add pollution limit constraint
model.addConstr(
    PollutionJ * NumProcessJ + PollutionP * NumProcessP <= MaxPollution,
    name="pollution_limit"
)

constraints.description: The water used by both processes cannot exceed the maximum available water
constraints.code:
# Add water usage constraint
model.addConstr(WaterJ * NumProcessJ + WaterP * NumProcessP <= MaxWater, name="water_usage")

constraints.description: The pollution produced by both processes cannot exceed the allowable pollution limit
constraints.code:
# Add pollution limit constraint
model.addConstr(PollutionJ * NumProcessJ + PollutionP * NumProcessP <= MaxPollution, name="pollution_limit")

constraints.description: The number of operations for process J must be non-negative
constraints.code:
# Non-negativity constraint for the number of operations for process J
model.addConstr(NumProcessJ >= 0, name="non_negative_NumProcessJ")

constraints.description: The number of operations for process P must be non-negative
constraints.code:
# Non-negativity constraint for the number of operations for process P
model.addConstr(NumProcessP >= 0, name="non_negative_NumProcessP")

variables.definition: The number of operations involving the metal extraction process J.
The number of operations involving the metal extraction process P.

objective.description: Maximize the total amount of metal extracted from mined ores
objective.code:
# Set objective
model.setObjective(MetalJ * NumProcessJ + MetalP * NumProcessP, gp.GRB.MAXIMIZE)
